DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effectiveness Family Heart Health Educational Program ( The FIT-Heart Study )
DOC.detailed_description: FIT Heart randomize control trial test novel system approach increase adherence national prevention guideline among family member patient hospitalized CVD . Participants blood relative cohabitants patient hospitalize atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease , age 20-79 year , establish cardiovascular disease diabetes , speak English Spanish . Participants randomize special intervention group receive behavioral counsel education diet physical activity ; personalize risk factor screen immediate feedback ; reinforcement follow-up throughout year . The control group receive brief CVD prevention message form handout . All participant receive standardized assessment diet , lifestyle , CVD risk factor baseline 1 year ( 94 % follow-up ) . The main finding publish show mean percent change LDL-cholesterol level baseline 1-year improve group significantly different special intervention vs. control group ( -1 % vs. -2 % ; p=.64 ) .
